subject: Investing
title: Southeast Asia: The Next Frontier
description: One-minute skill: Southeast Asia: The Next Frontier.

hook.text: ASEAN's combined GDP ranks as the world's fifth-largest economyâ€”bigger than the UK or India individually.

buildup.text: Indonesia, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam, and Malaysia form a dynamic bloc of 700 million consumers.

discovery.text: Supply chain diversification away from China is directing manufacturing investment into Southeast Asia.

twist.text: Market access varies widely. Vietnam's market is liquid; others require careful navigation of ownership limits.

climax.text: ASEAN-focused ETFs offer diversified exposure without the complexity of individual country accounts.

punchline.text: Southeast Asia is quietly becoming the factory and market of the next decade.

quiz.question: What is driving investment into Southeast Asia?
options: Supply chain diversification away from China and young demographics
